title: Purple Sony Xperia Z3 announced as Carphone Warehouse exclusive | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Sony Xperia Z3
purple](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Sony has just announced a brand new model of its flagship[Xperia
Z3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/sony-xperia-z3-review) handset, which
sports a spiffing purple paintjob.**

The newly madeover device will proffer ‘soft purple’ coating, padding out the
current colour roster of black, white, and copper.

The new colour option will be a Carphone Warehouse exclusive, along with the
existing white model.

The retailer says it’s kicking off pricing at £33 per month, and has already
begun selling the device at its stores across the UK.

**Related:** [Sony Xperia Z4 release date, rumours, news, specs, and
price](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sony-xperia-z4-release-date-
rumours-news-specs-and-price)

Sony launched the Xperia Z3 late last year, just six months after its
predecessor, the [Xperia Z2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/sony-
xperia-z2-review).

It landed with a 2.5GHz quad-core Snapdragon 801 processor, 3GB of RAM, and
16GB of storage, expandable to 128GB via microSD.

The display measured up at 5.2-inches, with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 and a
pixel density of 424 ppi.

A 20.7-megapixel rear-facing snapper handled photography with a 2.2-megapixel
1080p sensor sorting out selfie shots.

Standout features of the phone include an industry-leading 12800 ISO rating,
Sony’s Triluminos display and X-Reality Engine, and an IP68 certified water-
resistant coating.

It comes with [Android 4.4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/android-4-4-kitkat-
review) OS built-in, but Sony assures us that [Android 5.0
Lollipop](https://www.trustedreviews.com/android-5-0-lollipop-review) will be
coming in [early February](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/all-sony-
xperia-z-models-to-get-android-5-0-lollipop-starting-february-2015).
